emails.body_html:
Week 1 Complete, {{first_name}}! <‰

Let's make sure you're getting maximum value from your Founder's Circle membership.

=ñ Master the Emergency Wallpaper System

Setup (One-time, 2 minutes):

  1. Open FINDERR app
  2. Go to Emergency Settings
  3. Enter your emergency email and phone number
  4. Enable Emergency Wallpaper feature
  5. Done! Your contact info is now ready to display when needed

Activation Methods:

Method 1: SMS Trigger (from any phone)

Text any of these commands to your phone:
EMERGENCY_ON, FINDERR_ON, EMERGENCY_ACTIVATE

Method 2: Web Dashboard (from any browser)

Visit finderr.app/dashboard ’ Click "Activate Emergency Mode"

What Happens:

  • Your phone's wallpaper instantly changes to display your emergency contact info
  • Anyone who finds your phone sees how to contact you
  • No unlocking needed - visible on lockscreen
  • Original wallpaper automatically backed up

Restoration:

Text EMERGENCY_OFF or use web dashboard to restore original wallpaper.

 Founder Advantage: Your emergency wallpaper system has 99.9% uptime with bulletproof persistence. It survives phone restarts, crashes, and battery drain. This is engineering excellence you can trust.

  • Real-time location tracking on map
  • 7-30 day location history with playback
  • Custom geofencing zones (home, work, school)
  • Lost Mode with remote device lock
  • Emergency location sharing with contacts
  • Location export (KML, GPX, CSV)

After 5,000: +$3/month | Founders: FREE

  • Crowdsourced Bluetooth mesh network
  • Offline phone recovery via community

  • Private family/company mesh networks
  • Community karma system (points for helping)

After 5,000: +$4/month | Founders: FREE
